title: 271 - How to Make a Campaign for YOU, Find Your Voice, Instagram Tips & More with Lauren Hom

SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://skl.sh/creativepeptalk to get started!!!

PATREON + YOU!
This episode is sponsored by YOU! Well, if you’re a patron of our podcast! This show is listener supported and that means we need your help! We are on a mission to reach 500 Patreon Backers for this podcast!! Go to Patreon.com/CreativePepTalk to back our show now!
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Lauren Hom, Co-Loop, Ryan Appleton, Andy J. Pizza)

itunes:title: 271 - How to Make a Campaign for YOU, Find Your Voice, Instagram Tips & More with Lauren Hom
itunes:author: Lauren Hom, Co-Loop, Ryan Appleton, Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
LAUREN HOM IS BACK!!!! Lauren’s first guest appearance back in 2017 was one of the most popular episodes of the show, and we are THRILLED to have her back!

We talk about:
- Why measuring your worth in numbers can destroy your soul
- How to turn a passion project into a powerful campaign for your creative practice
- Why you should build your practice on your voice and not your medium
- Instagram tips!

WE ALSO HAVE HUGE NEWS TO SHARE WITH YOU IN THIS EPISODE!!!!!!!!
